scripts.client-prod-w: SET GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false&& npm run build --prefix client
scripts.start-dev: concurrently "npm run dev-nodemon --prefix server" "npm run client-dev"
scripts.start-prod: SET NODE_ENV=production&& npm run client-prod && npm run build --prefix server && npm start --prefix server
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd .. && npm run client-prod && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.build-w: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd .. && npm run client-prod-w && npm run build --prefix server
